item.title: Why Neural Networks
item.description: Why neural networks? (an article I wrote back in 1996) This is an article I wrote about neural networks, back in 1996, as part of a university project. The article was lost but I found it on the wayback machine and I am republishing it since its content is still applicable today and the article was very popular in its day. For the last ten years Neural networks have attracted a great deal of attention.
